name: RemoveSubscriberFromWorkflow
description:
Remove a subscriber from a Mailchimp automation workflow.

This tool removes a subscriber from a specified Mailchimp classic automation workflow at any point, ensuring they cannot be re-added to the same workflow.

parameters.name: automation_workflow_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp automation workflow.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the Automation workflow.

parameters.name: subscriber_email_address
parameters.description: Email address of the list member to be removed from the workflow.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: workflow_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the Automation workflow.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the Automation workflow.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
